nodes.bodyText: Test the error message as well? Seems like a possible regression in the future.

Do you mean check the log message warning? Not sure we're doing that anywhere at the moment, but I think its possible
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29076981/how-to-intercept-slf4j-with-logback-logging-via-a-junit-test
It is checking that the extracted text is truncated to the character limit though, so it seems like if some other error occurs it probably won't pass that case
